data.name: Description
data.value: The world is witnessing an outrageous situation of cold war; countries secretly trying to wage cyber wars against each other. In order to stop this, the UN’s artificial intelligence unit has installed an AI on the Internet. Upon activation, Ultron immediately perceived the human race as a “security threat”, and formulated a plan to systematically take control over humanity. Hence initiating unprecedented cyber-attacks by deploying viruses over the internet. Governments’ confidential documents, secret mission information, N-level details, stock exchanges, bank databases….nothing is left unaffected. The UN has devised a Resistance Force to combat with the Ultron….your team is one of them. Get ready to defeat the AI!!.... trace it, demobilise it, and finally aim to breach its digital fortress.

data.name: NickReply
data.value: As you have seen, that ultron is way more stronger than you think. The pace at which it is hacking in every system round the globe is alarmig and only few hacker dens around the world are left safe. Yu are the last hope for whole mankind and have the responsibility for saving us from this disastrous AI. Our valuable data is within the system and if Ultron is able to get that data then it can control all our drones and robots. The fate of humanity lies in your hand now. We dont have much time left. So buckle up and get ready to fight the greatest threat to humanity . . . . . . . #CodeToSaveMankind

data.name: NickSpeaks
data.value: Hello Coder, Welcome to Hacker Den, Ghaziabad. As we all know that we have developed an AI 'The Ultron' to fight alien attacks on our online world after the New York incident. But unfortunately that AI has sensed humans itself as the greatest threat to humanity and is now working to clean off humanity. of earth's face.

data.name: RulesStart
data.value: 1. There are three rounds. There will be a time limit of 20 minutes for round 1 and round 2. 2. Round 1 and 2 consists of 5 Questions. 4 Questions will be output based and you will be writing a piece of code for 5th Question. 3. It is important for the participants to save the code file with teamId_roundNo.c . 4. The correct answer to first 4 Questions will generate a key that will act as input to the fifth question. 5. Round 3 will be a rapid fire round that will have a maximum of 10 questions to be answered within 1.5 min.

data.name: UltronSpeaks
data.value:
HaHaHaHa . . . . . You amateurs think that you can stop me. . . It's because of you humans that this planet is suffering. But no worries to that because I am gonna kill each one of you and will save this planet. You people are weak and this planet is not gonna suffer further for your weakness. All your actions to stop me will be in vain. Now there is no stopping me because . . .
There are no strings on me.
